column4: So I have a dilema, I need to install xubuntu on a computer with no OS, I have a ubuntu live cd, my question is there anyway to install xubuntu from the linux live ubuntu?
install ubuntu then apt-get install xubuntu-desktop
it is a little messy, yes. You will need to remove any GNOME apps you are not using.
my only other suggestion is to get a Xubuntu disc.
